name: Marketing Forums
description: Discussions and news from marketing communities.
selectionPrompt: Pick threads with real results (metrics, screenshots, case details) or platform changes with docs. Prefer many substantive comments; skip questions and self‑promotion.
essencePrompt: Discussion synthesis: context, top tactic (with metric), skeptical counterpoint (risk), and one test readers can run. 80–120 words.
perspectivesPrompt: Three one‑liners from comments when possible: 1) What worked (metric), 2) Pitfall to avoid, 3) How to test/measure. If none: 'No meaningful perspectives found.'
